verses.verse: The word <WH1697> that Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> concerning Babylon, <WH894> concerning the land <WH776> of the Chaldeans, <WH3778> by <WH3027> Jeremiah <WH3414> the prophet. <WH5030>

Go up <WH5927> against the land <WH776> of Merathaim, <WH4850> even against it, <WH3427> and against the inhabitants of Pekod: <WH6489> kill <WH2717> and utterly destroy <WH2763> after <WH310> them, <WH5002> says Yahweh, <WH3068> and do <WH6213> according to all that I have commanded you. <WH6680>

The voice <WH6963> of those who flee <WH5127> and escape out <WH6405> of the land <WH776> of Babylon, <WH894> to declare <WH5046> in Zion <WH6726> the vengeance <WH5360> of Yahweh <WH3068> our God, <WH430> the vengeance <WH5360> of his temple. <WH1964>

Call together <WH8085> the archers <WH7228> against Babylon, <WH894> all those who bend <WH1869> the bow; <WH7198> encamp <WH2583> against her all around; <WH5439> let none of it escape: <WH6413> recompense <WH7999> her according to her work; <WH6467> according to all that she has done, <WH6213> do <WH6213> to her; <WH2102> for she has been proud against Yahweh, <WH3068> against the Holy One <WH6918> of Israel. <WH3478>
